website_summaries.verdict: Good variety of different turkey calls for a reasonable price.
pros: If you can’t decide what type of call to try, or you like to use different calls in the field, this combo offers three of the most popular and effective turkey calls
Includes slate call and striker, box call, and mouth call with storage case for one low price
cons: Expert hunters may not be satisfied with the quality

customer_reviews.title: Upstairs neighbors love it!
customer_reviews.text: A friend invited me to go turkey hunting in the spring so I bought this kit thinking I should learn how to use it before then right? Well, I live in an apartment and upstairs are some terrible children who's momma let's them stay up stomping around all night. I've discovered that the best time to practice with this loud squawk box is about 1-2am when those little heathens are loud and waking me up. I start on this thing and the shut right up and get their little tails in bed and I don't hear them the rest of the night. I've needed this for the last 6 months and didn't even know it!
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great call. Calls in the turkeys and more.
customer_reviews.text: Great calls for a beginner like me. I practiced at home for a few days then went out and used it. I was given several compliments that my calls were great sounding. I called in my first turkey and took him home with me. My calls were so good I called in a coyote who came up behind me in the bushes and got within a foot of my back before I whipped around. Quite a first time turkey call experience. Lol
customer_reviews.author: D. Parrent

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Came with a different mouth call and a different box call. Also no chalk came with this like it says. Half the reason I picked this kid was for the mouth piece with the extra plastic piece. Supposed to make it louder. Guess I'll go buy one for 12 bucks. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Henry S.

customer_reviews.title: Best call for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a turkey call b4 this so while my opinion might not hold much weight, I can tell this they work and are easy to get to know. The hardest is the diaphram call to master, it took me a couple days so just keep trying. I remember running into the house ecstatic that I actually finally did it and making these horrible calls and my family not Understanding my excitement.
customer_reviews.author: barron tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems in good shape. So far I get why the order of difficulty goes from Box, to Slate, to diaphragm. I also get why the authenticity of the noises goes from Diaphragm, to Slate, to Box. The box was very simple to figure out but it just sounded like wood screeching to me. The Slate call sounded very realistic but the mouth call sounds best, or maybe it’s just me. That all being said, I’ve not taken myself to the turkey woods yet so we will see if I know as much as I do about the subject.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisintheWoods

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but inaccurate sounds
customer_reviews.text: This product has its up and downs, the sound of the round turkey call is very very accurate! However the wooden box thing just makes a really high pitch screech... I can’t think of a situation when or where to use it... the mouth piece sounds like a duck/goose.. in fact I tried it and called a bunch of Canadian geese on me lmao So I was undecided whether to do 3-4 stars but I’ll give them 4 because the product was as described and arrived safe and before it was expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set of beginner's calls
customer_reviews.text: The 3-pack of calls was a good value in my opinion. The Slate call is probably the best of the three in creating realistic sounds. I'm currently learning how to use the diaphragm call, so I can't speak too much to its quality, except for the fact that it has an annoying plastic piece on the top, which is really great at scratching the roof of your mouth and unseating the call. The box call is a bit too high pitched in my opinion, but I'm sure people have called birds in with worse.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good place to start!
customer_reviews.text: The calls in this set aren't the best calls on the market, but this is a great value for someone new to Turkey calls (or who hasn't been hunting in years like me). Get these and figure out which one(s) you feel most comfortable with, and also get some practice with the others: they each have advantages and disadvantages. These are perfectly capable of working in the field, but I used them for practice and then upgraded based on what worked best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the beginning turkey caller. My more expensive turkey calls are in storage and where I am at now there are a lot of wild turkeys. So I got this set to call them and the box and pot call pulled them in from 100+ yards away. Not real crazy about the mouth call. It seemed to fail after a couple of days of using it. Good set that will last a lot of seasons of hunting. And they have a lot of YouTube videos for support.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Beginner stuff
customer_reviews.text: These calls are all cheap, and really not worth your time. Even if you're a beginner, you will have an easier time getting good quality calls, if you can afford to do so. These calls sound ok, but just the feeling of them is cheap. I use them as backups that are left in the truck most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: MeanMan 5

customer_reviews.title: Overall value is good. Box and slate call work well but mouth ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall value is good. Box and slate call work well but mouth call is a safety concern. Strong bitter taste when put in mouth. I am sure there are very few if any regulations since this is not a food product and the components (i.e., bright orange tape) are probably sourced from China. Use in the mouth is probably dissolving chemicals from the product that are not intended or safe for ingestion. Picture of the kit now shows the mouth call with a white tape instead of the day-glow orange i received. Maybe the change because of the same complaint?? I am a chemist by training so i have some background here.
customer_reviews.author: StraightArrow

customer_reviews.title: Here turkey turkey...
customer_reviews.text: This set is a little bit of everything you need when turkey hunting. Except the gun....or bow. Well it doesn't come with the turkey itself or the woods but it definitely has the best set of calls you can ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Really good calls, even for seasoned hunters.
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a starter pack, but probably won’t change them out unless they get broken. Killed Turkeys with the box call and the slate call. Lost my striker and replaced it with the Primos 777 one. Really easy to use and Primos has a lot of videos on YouTube to teach you how to use the calls.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use also a starter kit for you. I bought this for my granddaughter who is 10 years old and she used it but still didn’t get a turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Williamson

customer_reviews.title: but since I really only wanted the slate call and saw the other two as bonuses I should have just bought a better slate call for
customer_reviews.text: Works, but not top tier quality. Fair for the price, but since I really only wanted the slate call and saw the other two as bonuses I should have just bought a better slate call for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Just me...

customer_reviews.title: Got my first turkey with this
customer_reviews.text: I got my first turkey with these. I couldnt figure out the mouth call but the box and stick thing worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Riegelhuth

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Im just trying turkey hunting and these are working great. It did come with the wrong mouth piece but one quick phone call to Primos and they are sending out the correct one at no charge and I get to keep the wrong one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Good turkey calls
customer_reviews.text: Nice turkey call set. Bought this last year for the spring hunt in Texas. The calls are very nice and make good noise. I think I need more practice though.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Turkeys Beware :)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our outdoorsman son and he loves it. Would be nice if it included some sort of link to a tutorial but he is starting to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: but a great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Mouth call takes quite a bit of practice, but a great starter kit. Box call is definitely the best part of this kit. When the sound starts to vary, try adjusting the Allen screw on top.
customer_reviews.author: Cdcii

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but  get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner kit, but quality is pretty low. No instructions included, but Primos has decent YouTube tips. The box call is useless, but the slate and reed are going in my gear bag.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a beginner. Easy to use. And good instructions. Hopefully they will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: JBrookie

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time turkey hunters who are still figuring it all out.
customer_reviews.text: Quality starter kit. Makes great turkey sounds. Primos has tons of how to videos on YouTube to get you started.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: 10 minutes after opening and testing them for the hunt, they go down hill and hardly sound like a Turkey
customer_reviews.author: Ranger8991

customer_reviews.title: Great value bagged my Tom
customer_reviews.text: great value used the box call to call in a nice big Tom 6 1/2 in beard. This is my first time turkey hunting and they were gobbling right back walked right up to my decoy and thud put an arrow right through him. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice starter kit I’ve used it two season and called in my birds.
customer_reviews.author: T Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Mouth call burns
customer_reviews.text: Have used mouth calls without issue, whatever this one is made of causes mouth and lips to burn. The rest of the set is fine, I'll just replace the mouth call.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fram

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: First year hunting turkey, I alternated between the box and slate call to bring in a nice tom turkey. Pretty easy to use with a bit of practice. I would definitely recommend this package for a novice turkey hunter. Michigan has about a 30 precent success rate on turkey tags, with these calls I got it done.
customer_reviews.author: D.K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit. I'm a beginner Turkey hunter so I cant say I'm the say all Turkey call expert but they all make pretty good Turkey sounds. My Turkey hunting buddy's were impressed enough to go out buy some primos calls
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use in the field for my first turkey hunt this spring. But have been practicing at home and it is a great value kit for the entry level hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Plouse

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Not super high quality but it still does the job. I am not out turkey hunting all the time so it fits my needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Good Starter package, the only piece I had a problem with is the slate call, it does not work great, the box call which has always been my favorite works great, mouth call works great, but the slate call definitely detracted from it being a great deal .
customer_reviews.author: Brutal One

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: Great set of calls, like the idea of having a box and slate on hand and these were perfect to throw in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell James Dahlgren

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: The slate is actually sounds really good and is nice and compact. The mouth call is a bit high pitched and the box call is basically useless
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Can't wait to get out in the woods with her. All the tools to get started. Great package for beginners. Sounds great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as depicted. The mouthpiece is the only point of concern
customer_reviews.author: J-Rx

customer_reviews.title: Bought for son to practice with. Box call only ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son to practice with. Box call only lasted a few months. But let's face it it was a 10yr old boy who used this.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. It's a perfect starter set. Only started hunting turkey this spring and was able to call them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable calls
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got his first turkey, so I assume they work. 😊 I liked the value as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gretel Peters

customer_reviews.title: Brought in a Tom!
customer_reviews.text: Brought a Tom in with the pot and stick call! Bought this set just before my tag started, so I didn't get to practice with the mouth call. The pot and stick call brought in a Tom on the first day! Too far out to hit with the bow though. Box call is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Dobes2012

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good calls just sand down the slate and the stick for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great little starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: This comes with everything you need to start calling in the big boys. I've been practicing in my house and wound up having a few Jakes come strut their stuff up to the porch.
customer_reviews.author: simply_miller

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: The package is good for the price. I think it is much cheaper than buying individual pieces. That being said the slate is low end, and doesn't work well in any kind of rain or snow, and makes strange noises sometimes in the cold (I was using it at `10000ft in April). I think the box and mouth call work pretty well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Overall very easy to use. Called in several Toms with the slate and box calls. I found the mouth piece very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Not sure the mouth call is all that great. Slate call is tricky to get good sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was expecting, though I haven't tried them on the field yet. Box call seems easiest to use. Not sure the mouth call is all that great. Slate call is tricky to get good sounds from. Generally, I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew De Angelis

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: The drum broke in <3 months and well the mouth piece I never figured it out. The Box seems to be very good and hold up well
customer_reviews.author: Lover of all things

customer_reviews.title: Everything is easy to use for the novice hunter
customer_reviews.text: Everything is easy to use for the novice hunter. Slate makes a great sound has become part of my regular arsenal. Reeds hold up really well and maintained tension all season.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Shelby

customer_reviews.title: the slate and diaphragm call are very easy. i picked up these two calls in about ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price you really can't beat it. the slate and diaphragm call are very easy. i picked up these two calls in about 2 days. the box call is not the greatest but still gets the general sound. really not a bad set up for just begging
customer_reviews.author: Carol Miner

customer_reviews.title: Fun to try
customer_reviews.text: Fun to talk turkey with the wild turkeys in our area. I cant get them to come any closer yet but yet do answer the calls.
customer_reviews.author: simplydad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent product and worked in a pinch since I lost my calls from last season.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit to get started chasing turkeys with. All three calls have pretty decent sound to them. Keep practicing with these and before you know it they will be talking back.
customer_reviews.author: TFox3

customer_reviews.title: great value and good sound.
customer_reviews.text: The calls in this starter pack sounded way better than I thought they would. We called a curious turkey into the back yard just by playing with the different calls shortly after opening the package.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Kelley

customer_reviews.title: This is a top notched set. It works very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a top notched set. It works very well. As I am new to this I still have to master the diaphragm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is it the best? Probly not. But will get you started.
customer_reviews.author: F.C.

customer_reviews.title: great way learn to call turkeys with live lessons
customer_reviews.text: everything needed to try all three calls including lessons on how to use them and how it should sound
customer_reviews.author: Skypilot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is good for some one learning how to call and to hunt turkey for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad starter set.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad set for the money. The diaphragm call will take practice, the slate call works great but the box call is pretty bad but what do expect for how cheap the set is.
customer_reviews.author: TopRamen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter pack. Got my first turkey using the mouth call!!! It takes some time to learn to use them, I used videos on You Tube. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Price for what you get it's not too bad to start out and learn with just keep in ...
customer_reviews.text: Price for what you get it's not too bad to start out and learn with just keep in mind you're not going to be getting top shelf stuff.
customer_reviews.author: John of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. This was his first year turkey hunting. This was a great combo pack at a very reasonable price. Products seemed well made and he found them easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hossio77

customer_reviews.title: Un happy
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy the striker and mouth call are both missing clicked the link and was told it was unavailable
customer_reviews.author: papitbull

customer_reviews.title: good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Now if I could only figure out how to stop sounding like the turkey equivalent of Yoko Ono...
customer_reviews.author: jdb

customer_reviews.title: practice
customer_reviews.text: each sounds like turkeys cant wait for turkey season to give it a try, may go out and give it a try and learn from them I like the fact that it comes with all 3 and I get to learn each call and or my hunting partner can use one and me the other to get a few more birds to the dinner plate
customer_reviews.author: Dave Grammer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all in one kit for Wild Turkey Hunting
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. Perfect all in one kit for Wild Turkey Hunting.
customer_reviews.author: John Hume

customer_reviews.title: Call em up
customer_reviews.text: Every call works great. All have a little different sound and volume. Slate works great and is loud. Box is more subtle. Mouth call is just fun.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The box call was just ok and the rest is junk
customer_reviews.author: Farmerjohn

customer_reviews.title: The box call is terrible, the slate call sounds pretty good but you ...
customer_reviews.text: These calls don’t sound realistic at all! The box call is terrible, the slate call sounds pretty good but you can’t purr with it, and the mouth call is very high pitched.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Not he best sounding. Slate is decent
customer_reviews.text: Cheap calls. Not he best sounding. Slate is decent, but the box call is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The slate call sounds good but was a lot smaller than I expected. It was only slightly larger than a can of Copenhagen. The box call was extremely high pitched and didn't sound right to my liking, I ended up giving it to my little boy to keep him off of my better calls!
customer_reviews.author: outdoorenthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have two turkeys, they defiantly pay attention to this
customer_reviews.author: C.R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mouth call that comes with this kit. I feel like the plastic dome works well. The slate is ok. It has a good bit of volume and the sounds isn't too bad. However I really wasn't a fan of the striker that came with it. I really don't care for the box call that came with this kit at all though. Overall I'd say it was a good buy if you're willing to have to get a different box call.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Porter

customer_reviews.title: Nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy for a starter pack ..all work nicely .ty
customer_reviews.author: JPotter

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! My son loves to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy N

customer_reviews.title: Shows 3 seperate turkey calls in picture. When I ...
customer_reviews.text: Shows 3 seperate turkey calls in picture. When I got it , all 3 in 1 package. Would not have bought it this way. Can not resell as total package.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Riehle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Excited to get them out in the field this season
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: It works.  Barely. Buy the good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality entry level stuff. Barely works but it does technically work. Spend afew more dollars and get better stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mark- mobile master

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had a bunch of toms gobble, but im not able to seal the deal
customer_reviews.author: Arlo

customer_reviews.title: great kit!
customer_reviews.text: im new to turkey hunting. the only thing i dont like about this kit is the mouth call, but thats only cuz of my mouth not the quality of it. the slate and box call are pretty good and easy to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: cliffordingles

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these in the past but this is more of a toy not a tool
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 year old, every thing in the package worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylia E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter package. I have been hunting for years. The slate call was small but worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCord

customer_reviews.title: One out of 3
customer_reviews.text: Slate call works great. The other two sounds like crap
customer_reviews.author: chadn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This Turkey Hunter Starter Pack was just what I needed to get started. It has good quality sound out of a relatively low priced item. Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Happymama

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the best quality. Save your money and buy something higher quality
customer_reviews.author: Mn92

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit hard to understand but the tools worked good I got a turkey
customer_reviews.text: The directions were a bit hard to understand but the tools worked good I got a turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I need the practice of working out the mouth piece version the other two are great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David B Fretz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good sound. I like it. The quality is good enough for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Powder Surfer

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: great pack. everything I needed. small and compact to carry in my hunting vest. I bought one for a gift too
customer_reviews.author: k.garrison

customer_reviews.title: Good, no great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a turkey master, but I have played with a few of these through out time. The slate is really good quality and has a great sound. The box call is the easiest and has a true sound. The reed caller takes a bit to get used to since especially if you wear partials or have a sensitive gag reflex. I've researched several different vendors to find a "all in one" package and this one takes the whole factory. Packages deliver fast so that you can get the practice in and get to calling.
customer_reviews.author: L. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pack
customer_reviews.text: For the price, its a great system to use. The slate is good, the box is nice and the mouth call is also nice. Use it and bring in those birds!
customer_reviews.author: W. W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The product came pretty quickly. It was as expected
customer_reviews.text: The product came pretty quickly. It was as expected, and not the best quality, but I knew it wouldn't be top notch by the price I payed for it. Overall, I'm happy with it, but wouldn't recommend anyone to buy this expecting it to be of the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Earl

customer_reviews.title: easy to use calls!
customer_reviews.text: Theses calls are good quality (as i see them) and they produce a good sound. I like the box call best and the mouth call least. Overall, they are good. p.s DO NOT BUY IT FROM GREEN MOUNTAN OUTFITERS
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Georges

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about turkey hunting but the starter pack was great. It gives you a few different calls to use and practice with. What I appreciated more than anything was the great customer service provided by LG Outdoors. I screwed up when placing my order and scheduled my delivery to my old address.After I realized my mistake I emailed and called LG both people I had contact with were very helpful and made sure that my shipment was corrected. I will be buying more products from them in the future and I would recomend them to my friends for there hunting equipment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The calls work awesome
customer_reviews.text: The use of these calls were very easy to use even while hunting in the field. I would recommend these calls to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Mouth call is the best part of this kit
customer_reviews.text: The price for the whole kit is ok, and if you're just starting out turkey hunting this might be a good place to start. You will definitely want a better striker, the cheapo one that comes with it is terrible. The box call is so-so, I probably won't even take it out this year though. The mouth call actually is pretty good, and it's the saving grace of this kit for me. All in all, for a person that is just trying turkey hunting out, or the hunter on the budget, this kit is useable. However, the more you use other calls the more you realize how much better you can get for a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: This was a Valentine's day gift for my husband that he LOVED! It was everything "fowl" bundled into one! He was thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Turbo515

customer_reviews.title: 1st time hunter
customer_reviews.text: These are all of the calls that a first time turkey hunter needs to start with. By far a better deal than the local shops for a combo package.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Gasser

customer_reviews.title: I love the slate call
customer_reviews.text: I love the slate call, but the box call sounds awful. It makes more of a squeak. The diaphragm would be ok in a pinch, but would not be my go-to option.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Couric

customer_reviews.title: a great combo
customer_reviews.text: the reed is what stands out the most for me. the ease of use and sounds. it is a great combo for any sound or weather.
customer_reviews.author: levi

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner kit
customer_reviews.text: I got this so my fiance and I could go out for the fall season in MO. Stuff all works great. Now she won't stop using the mouth call at random times. Scares the hell out of me. Box call works great too. Don't forget to bring your chalk on the hunt though!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Day

product_meta.title: Primos Hunting 272 Friction Call, Turkey, Starter Pack
product_meta.description: A comprehensive kit with the whole range of calls you need to get started speaking The Turkey s Language!. Designed by turkey-calling experts for realistic intense sound This kit includes one double sided box call one. Sonic Dome slate pot with slim striker one Sonic Dome double with bat cut diaphragm mouth call one conditioning kit and a case that carries it all. Features: - Double sided box call Sonic Dome slate pot - Slim striker Sonic Dome double with bat - cut diaphragm mouth call conditioning kit carrying case.
feature_bullets: Double Sided box call sonic dome slate pot
Slim striker sonic dome double with bat
Cut diaphragm mouth call conditioning kit carrying case
A great collection of calls for the beginner or advanced hunter
Includes a Sonic Dome slate call and wooden striker
Includes a Mouth Call and Storage Case
